scripts.postpush: while true; do git push && { echo 'Git push succeeded'; break; } || echo 'Git push failed, retrying in 1 seconds'; sleep 1; done
scripts.pull: while true; do git pull && { echo 'Git pull succeeded'; break; } || echo 'Git pull failed, retrying in 1 seconds'; sleep 1; done
scripts.i: make && INST_PREFIX=/usr/local/openresty make install && make clean
